name: Daniil Kvyat
introduction: Daniil Vyacheslavovich Kvyat (Russian:   ; pronounced:kv-YAT; born 26 April 1994 in Ufa, Bashorotostan, Russia) is a Russian racing driver who made his Formula One debut in the 2014 Formula One season for the ToroRosso team, alongside Jean-ric Vergne. His car number is #26. Kvyat got his first opportunity to drive a Formula One car when he participated in the Young Driver Test for the same team during the 2013 season, in the U.S. and Brazil.
